channel.title: UX Collective on Joshua Graves
channel.description: Recent content in UX Collective on Joshua Graves

item.title: Black Mirror Brainstorms
item.description: I want to have more ethical products. I feel like we all do. Sometimes, though, we don’t consider how this amazing thing we’re working on might have some unintended and negative consequences.

item.title: Push Notif-ications, the good, the bad, and the wtf could u not
item.description: Why you should give people more control over the notifications they receive from you.
